"Xiera": "If you <red>spend enough of your Gear Gauge with a single Charge Protect<c>, you'll unleash a powerful special move when you drop your guard."
"This special move, \"<red>Protect Release<c>\", will be enhanced if you <red>consume even more of the Gear Gauge<c>!"
"<red>Use Protect Release 3 times<c> while avoiding being hit by enemy attacks!"

"・When your Gear Gauge is full:
\u3000Use your Weapon Action with <%PhotonArts> until you
\u3000consume enough Gear for Protect Release
・Hold the button longer for an enhanced Protect Release"

"・When your Gear Gauge is full:
\u3000Use your Weapon Action with <%MainPaletteC> until you
\u3000consume enough Gear for Protect Release
・Hold the button longer for an enhanced Protect Release"
